text: 8.7: Mt 10.1; Mk 16.17Mbe khuarar Firip nzuai buni ga tɨgap, mbe vhɨra ana garim, ana gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve tɨn mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharigim, nta sɨsɨm mbatɨga mbuav, mbe thamthav kɨrar hi. Ana vhɨra bigi rimgiap sɨɨr ki gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve, gum suira mbatɨgi gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve, ana mbe mbuim, mbe nzezerigi.
